attributes.action: Ask Lester Moore to return to his rightful role as leader of SYNTRONIX
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The fantastic and popular band SYNTRONIX have had the heart taken out of them after the sad departure of Lester Moore. We the undersigned urge Lester to return to the band and fulfill the wishes of a thousand lonley hearts.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
